      • getGrowthRate

        java.lang.Double getGrowthRate()
        Returns:
        Rate at which population is increased at the end of a round of turns.

      • getMaximumPopulation

        java.lang.Long getMaximumPopulation()
        Returns:
        Population limit for cells. Cells that grow above this will be "truncated" back to this value.

      • getTimeOutInMilliseconds

        int getTimeOutInMilliseconds()
        Returns:
        Time-out value in ms for each PlayerBot.getNextCommands call. Commands added to the parameter list before the time-out are considered as valid.

      • getTurnLimit

        int getTurnLimit()
        Returns:
        Maximum number of turns that the game will run. If this value is reached, the player with the highest population sum over the board wins.

      • getCurrentTurn

        int getCurrentTurn()
        Returns:
        Current turn number.
